body.name: Nulaxy USB Webcam with Microphone, HD 1080p Webcam with Privacy Cover for Laptop PC Desktop, HD Light Correction, Web Camera for Video Calling, Online Classes, Skype, Zoom, FaceTime, Smart TV

features: FULL HD 1080P WEBCAM – C900 webcam with advanced video processing technology supports H.264 to capture sharp and clear image at 30fps. High definition 1080P webcam provides smooth video for video chatting, conferencing, webinar etc.

PLUG & PLAY and ROTATION - Just plug the USB cable into the computer’s USB port, no any drivers needed, plug and play. Wide 92° view angle, 360° rotating head and adjustable clip can achieve optimal viewing angle and gives easy access to any laptop, monitor, PC or tripod.

BUILT-IN STEREO MICROPHONE - Featured with high sensitivity and echo-canceling technology, the USB camera with built-in omnidirectional microphone is very sensitive to capture clear sound in rich stereo audio from different angles.

PRIVACY SHUTTER - The webcam with cover allows you to control what you want to show, protects your privacy, and gives you peace of mind when not in use. Just slide the webcam cover to close when needed and to blocks potential hackers. Cable length: 6 ft. (1.8 m)

UNIVERSAL COMPATIBILITY - The computer webcam can widely work with PC, notebook and laptop, compatible with Windows 7, 8, 10 and above, Linux 2.6.24, Mac OS 10.6, Android 5.1 and other operating systems, supports major platforms like Skype, OBS, Twitch, Youtube, Face time, XBOX, Xsplit, Twitter, Whatsapp and more.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Specifications Dynamic Resolution 1920*1080 Frame Rate 30fps Image Sensor 1/2.7 2MP Camera Angle 92° Power Supply USB DC5V Best Image Range 0.5-5 meters Encoding Format MJPG/YUY2/H.264 System Compatibility Windows XP/Win7/Win8/ Win10/Linux 2.6.24 and above, Mac OS 10.10.6 and above, Android5.1 and above

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy setup - nice camera for the price
reviews.reviewText: I wanted to replace my aging Logitech Orbit MP, as the resolution on the Logitech wasn't cutting it anymore. I felt I could compromise on some of the features of the Logitech such as motorized zoom, pan, tilt, and tracking since we usually stay stationary during a video call and I didn't want to break the bank.Installation was as simple as plugging it into the computer. Picture quality was generally good and it was a definitely an upgrade in resolution from my old Logitech. I never had an issue with audio. The built in privacy cover was a plus and the LEDs that light up when it is in use is also helpful. Overall, for the price, it's a good webcam that I'd be happy to purchase again.Few notes: This is a wide angle webcam. It's great for skype with the whole family. It's fine for just one person so it captures pretty wide, but with the background replacement functionality, it works well enough. There is no internal hardware zoom. It swivels left and right, but there is no tilt up and down. You can adjust the tilt by hand and it stays pretty well on my monitor, but I would have liked to have it tilt up and down (with the clip staying stationary) versus messing with the clip that holds the camera to the monitor. The webcam stays put on my monitor, but it's not the most positive feel. It will move if you bump it. But, because of how I'm using it, I felt these were all things I could live with, especially for the price point. Also, many of the webcams in this price range have the same "features" i.e. no tilt, similar clip, etc. My expectations for a webcam in this price range were met or exceeded.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great camera at a great price to enhance your WFH experience!
reviews.reviewText: Like many of us, I have been working from home for almost a year now and I'm making enhancements here and there to improve my WFH experience!I use a Macbook Air. I often like to just use my big monitor and close my Macbook, which is called "clamshell mode." However, when I'm just using my monitor, I no longer have a webcam! I unfortunately need a camera for Zoom calls where I need to turn on video. Thus, I found this webcam to attach to my monitor! Now I can continue to enjoy using my monitor and not have to worry about opening my laptop just for the webcam.The camera quality is good. The camera is a wide angle lens and it's adjustable, which is nice! I have mine just perched on top of the monitor. And it's very easy to just literally plug and play! For programs like Zoom, you just need to select the new camera as your video output under the video settings. I also really like the sliding cover so I don't feeling like I'm being watch by the man when I am not on calls!Finally, the mic is handy as well. It is also easy to switch to the camera as your audio setting as well.For a great price, you can get this great camera and enhance your WFH experience!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 5, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very limited adjustments
reviews.reviewText: This is a very decent camera, but there are two things I dislike.First, the color is sometimes whited out. As mentioned in other reviews there is no native software for this thing. Any control of the picture quality is dependent on the program the camera is being used by. With Skype, there are changeable settings for the camera, but none of those got rid of the whiting out I experienced. Adjusting the brightness either made everything too dark or my skin and other lighter colors too white. None of the other settings helped, either.Secondly, I don't like the focus/field of view. With this camera I can see myself, along with 15' of my back wall and everything else back there. That is, the field of view is too big. This is with the camera 2' from my face. If you look at other users' pics you'll see what I'm talking about. That might be nice if you're trying to get the whole family in on the session, but if it's just you this camera doesn't seem ideal. I just turned it back on and moved closer to see what happened: with my face 16" away I filled 1/3 of the screen, but the other 2/3 on either side was quite visible and actually in proper focus, unlike my face. 2' away seems to be where the focus starts to sharpen, but then I'm only filling about 1/4 of the screen.I will say I do like the mounting clip, it works perfectly on top of my monitor. I also like the privacy shutter, but I just unplug my camera when not in use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lots of Applications
reviews.reviewText: This is my first webcam purchase and I am amazed at how small and lightweight the unit and camera are and how securely it sits on the monitor. The USB cord is a generous 4’ 10” in length and is an easy reach from the computer tower to my monitor. The installation instructions were very clear and made it easy to plug into the computer USB port and position the camera on my monitor.I am amazed that it is just plug the camera into into a USB port, access a teleconference site and I was ready to go. Very easy. All of the people that I have been conferencing with have commented on the outstanding picture and sound quality. After tinkering with the camera stand and mount, I was able to adjust the angle and rotation so I was perfectly positioned in the picture. The camera cover is a great feature that provides some peace of mind that I am not being recorded when I don’t want to be.After using the Nulaxy C900 Webcam in several web chats I am amazed at how easy it was to set up and the tremendous quality of the product. I wonder why I didn’t purchase a webcam years ago.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great camera for the price
reviews.reviewText: The Nulaxy C900 Webcam is a great overall webcam especially for the price. The Nulaxy C900 Webcam produces a better, sharper video for my video calls. I had to upgrade my camera as my webcam on my computer always produced blurred images. However, the Nulaxy has crisp video quality that easily surpasses my laptop’s existing camera. In addition, the clip on the Nulaxy secures the camera to the top of my monitor. I have had no issues with clipping my camera to the top of laptop. In addition, its design allows it to be easily removed when I need to transport my laptop. Also, it was very easy to install. I would recommend this camera to anyone needed a new webcam.
La cambie por otra camara a los 2 meses porque de la nada dejo de encender

reviews.reviewTitle: Super Webcam wenn man nicht viel ausgeben mag
reviews.reviewText: Natürlich gibt es bessere Cams. Aber diese erfüllt Ihren Zweck. Die Mikrofon Qualität ist super und das bild auch. Hier macht man nichts falsches für den Preis.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on November 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: Sound and picture quality is great for what I need
reviews.reviewText: This is an ideal, cheapish camera, took a few minutes to work out how it fitted onto the top of the screen - doh! Sound and picture quality is great for what I need which is mainly for training webinars and my friend likes to use messenger to talk to me on screen.

reviews.reviewTitle: alta qualità di immagine e di audio
reviews.reviewText: L'ho presa per la mia postazione di smart-working, pienamente soddisfatto. Ottima qualità di immagine e anche il microfono si sente benissimo.
